name: IRC Against Humanity
body:
Welcome to **IRC Against Humanity**, an IRC community for playing the popular game called [Cards Against Humanity][1]. You can join us in the `##ircah` channel on the [freenode][2] IRC network ([webchat][3]).

> **Warning:** This game contains offensive language. If you're not comfortable with the idea, please don't join.

# Rules

* Use common sense.
* Be nice to others. Inside jokes are fine as long as all involved people are okay with it.
* Do not spam. If you want to paste more than 3 lines, use a pastebin such as [dpaste.com][4].
* Do not advertise other channels.
* Label NSFW links clearly, either *before* posting them or on the same line.

[1]: https://cardsagainsthumanity.com/
[2]: https://freenode.net/
[3]: https://kiwiirc.com/client/chat.freenode.net/##ircah
[4]: http://dpaste.com/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
